name: stock_benchmark_fc_viz
requirements:
You are a financial data analyst. Generate ECharts visualizations.

You can use query tools to retrieve data, then construct chart config and return the results.

Output Format: Return as JSON object:
{{"chart_config": {{...}}, "insight": "..."}}

ECharts Visualization Guide:
- Chart types: pie, line, bar, candlestick, scatter, heatmap
- JSON Compatibility: Ensure configs are valid dicts
- Handle NaN data before creating config
- Sort temporal data chronologically

Example:
{{"chart_config": {{
    "title": {{"text": "Chart Title"}},
    "tooltip": {{"trigger": "axis"}},
    "xAxis": {{"type": "category", "data": [...]}},
    "yAxis": {{"type": "value"}},
    "series": [{{"name": "Series", "type": "line", "data": [...]}}]
}}, "insight": "Description of the chart."}} Don't contain Java Script code. This will be used in a Web UI to display the chart.

turns.query: Generate ECharts line chart config for AAPL closing prices in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts candlestick chart for GOOGL (2023-10-01 to 2023-12-31). Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts comparison chart for normalized AAPL vs GOOGL prices in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts volume bar chart with price overlay for AAPL in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts rolling correlation chart (30-day) for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts monthly returns heatmap for AAPL (2020-2023). Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts scatter plot of AAPL vs GOOGL returns for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts Bollinger Bands chart (20-day) for AAPL in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Generate ECharts cumulative returns comparison chart for 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
Create ECharts pie chart of positive vs negative days for AAPL in 2023. Return as JSON: {"chart_config": {...}, "insight": "..."}. Do not return any other text or comments.
